questions.title: Question 7 for Class CLIMATE102_190904
questions.main: The processes of condensation and freezing:
questions.answer: A) both release sensible heat into the environment

mcq.option: A) both release sensible heat into the environment
B) both absorb sensible heat from the environment
C) do not affect the temperature of their surroundings
D) do not involve energy transport

questions.title: Question 9 for Class CLIMATE102_190904
questions.main: Meteorology did not become a genuine science until:
questions.answer: B) the invention of weather instruments

mcq.option: B) the invention of weather instruments
E) satellite data became available to the weather forecaster

questions.title: Question 10 for Class CLIMATE102_190904
questions.main: Which below is not a way in which a contrail may form?
questions.answer: C) due to heating of the air by the engine exhaust

mcq.option: A) from water vapor in the engine exhaust mixing with air
B) by air cooling as it passes over the aircraft's wings
C) due to heating of the air by the engine exhaust
